Package com.alticelabs.ccp.exagon.api.annotations

package com.alticelabs.ccp.exagon.api.annotations
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.alticelabs.ccp.exagon.api.annotations.enums
     
  • Annotation Interfaces
    Class
    Description
    ExagonChoreographyController
    An ExagonChoreographyController is a class that maps all events and a command for a certain method.
    ExagonCollection
    Annotation used in entities for microservices.
    ExagonCommand
    An annotation used to mark objects as Exagon commands that are exchanged between microservices in a Saga.
    ExagonCommandHandler
    An annotation to register a method that waits for the availability of subscribed events, as Exagon commands and Exagon notifications, to start processing.
    ExagonController
    An annotation to identify classes with ExagonCommandHandler methods for processing subscribed events, as Exagon commands and Exagon notifications.
    ExagonNotification
    An annotation used to mark objects as Exagon notifications that are exchanged between microservices in a Saga.
    ExagonProtocolMapperController
    An annotation to identify classes with ExagonCommandHandler methods for processing subscribed events, as Exagon commands and Exagon notifications.
    ExagonRepository
